Hello!

My name is Lokesh Dhakar. I work on the Design Engineering team at Weebly in San Francisco.

Previously I worked at Getaround as the Engineering Lead of the Web Team. See my full work history at LinkedIn.

I created the original Lightbox script many years ago. More recently I created Color Thief. See all my open source projects on Github.

I take photos on Instagram, post designs on Dribbble, and track my runs and bike rides on Strava.
